name: uBot
description: A great bot with advanced features (coming soon)

enable-speedhack.name: Enable Speedhack
enable-speedhack.description: Enable speedhack, only works while recording or replaying

speedhack.name: Speedhack
speedhack.description: Change the speed the game runs at

speedhack-audio.name: Speedhack Audio
speedhack-audio.description: Change the speed of the audio to match the game

lock-delta.name: Lock Delta
lock-delta.description: Makes sure frames don't get skipped, only works while recording or replaying

practice-fix.name: Practice Bug Fix
practice-fix.description: Fixes checkpoints not properly saving and loading player data and inturn creating small inaccuracies

frame-fix.name: Frame Fix
frame-fix.description: Makes the macro more accurate but increases the file size, only applies when recording. Not needed anymore since practice bug fix fixes the innacuracies.
